tn.ref: Valley of Ben Hinnom
tn.text: See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:jer:07:31|7:31]].

tn.ref: See
tn.text: AT: "Listen" or "Pay attention to what I am about to tell you"

tn.ref: the ears of everyone who hears of it will tingle
tn.text: AT: "it will shock everyone who hears of it" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])

tn.ref: they have abandoned me
tn.text: Here the word "they" refers to the people of Judah.

tn.ref: filled this place with innocent blood
tn.text: AT: "murdered many innocent people in this place" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])

tn.ref: something that I did not command
tn.text: AT: "something that I forbid them to do" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_litotes]])

tn.ref: nor did it enter my mind
tn.text: Here the word "mind" refers to Yahweh's thoughts. AT: "nor did I ever think about it" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])

tn.ref: see
tn.text: AT: "listen" or "pay attention to what I am about to tell you"

tn.ref: this is Yahweh's declaration
tn.text: See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:jer:01:07|1:8]].

tn.ref: this place will no longer be called
tn.text: AT: "people will no longer call this place" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])

tn.ref: Topheth ... the Valley of Ben Hinnom ... the Valley of Slaughter
tn.text: See how you translated these names in [[:en:bible:notes:jer:07:31|7:31]].

tn.ref: I will make them to fall by the sword before their enemies
tn.text: AT: "I will make their enemies kill them with swords" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])

tn.ref: by the hand of the ones seeking their lives
tn.text: This phrase means basically the same thing as the previous phrase. AT: "I will allow those who want to kill them to kill them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_parallelism]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])

tn.ref: hissing
tn.text: The "S" sound, which shows strong disapproval.

tn.ref: I will make them eat
tn.text: "I will make the people who live in Jerusalem eat"

tn.ref: this is Yahweh's declaration
tn.text: See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:jer:01:07|1:8]].

tn.ref: it could not be repaired again
tn.text: AT: "no one can repair it again" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])

tn.ref: this is Yahweh's declaration
tn.text: See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:jer:01:07|1:8]].

tn.ref: and of the kings of Judah
tn.text: AT: "and the houses of the kings of Judah" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])

tn.ref: See
tn.text: AT: "Listen" or "Pay attention to what I am about to tell you"

tn.ref: stiffened their neck and refused to listen
tn.text: The phrase "refused to listen" means basically the same thing as "stiffened their neck" and explains how the people did so. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_parallelism]])
